advancements.rigoranthusemortisreborn.st: An endeavor to gain insight regarding that which has been lost sight of.
Kill a member of the Lost Species.
Obtain a record of the Lost Species.
Learn more about the Lost Species The 'Languid Dweller' by listening to a Forgotten Record.
death.attack.rigoranthusemortisreborn.ne: %1$s died from §cNecrotizing Fasciitis whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.rigoranthusemortisreborn.ra: %1$s has bled out from Razortooth wounds
%1$s died from Razortooth wounds whilst fighting %2$s
gamerule.does_dweller_spawn.description: Turns on or off ability for languid dweller to spawn
gamerule.allow_canis_spawn.description: True/On = Canis Chordata allowed to spawn.
gamerule.allowCanisSpawn.description: True/On = Canis Chordata allowed to spawn.
gamerule.allowDwellerSpawn.description: True/On = Languid Dweller allowed to spawn.
gamerule.allow_dweller_spawn.description: Turns on or off ability for languid dweller to spawn
gamerule.allow_necraw_spawn.description: True/On = Languid Dweller allowed to spawn.
gamerule.allowNecrawSpawn.description: True/On = Necraw Fascii allowed to spawn.
item.rigoranthusemortisreborn.forgotten_: A crumbling record. Perhaps it contains knowledge of things long since forgotten.
item.rigoranthusemortisreborn.music_disk: Ever wanted to start a night club?
item.rigoranthusemortisreborn.item_linke: Lol this ain't asposed to exist
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.augment: Right-click in the air to change mode
Redstone Control mode: will NOT smelt when supplied with a redstone signal
Redstone Inverse Control mode: will ONLY smelt when supplied with a redstone signal
Comparator mode: An internal comparator, outputs signal to all sides
Comparator Subtraction mode: same as Comparator mode but signal subtraction strength is configurable in the smeltery GUI
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.soul_co: §c§oBurns with the cries of lost souls.
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.crushin: durability, and are used to crush
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.dweller: their thoracic cage in good condition.
You can also craft one with
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.esoteri: A resource coveted by the Languid Dweller
§kA resource coveted by the Languid Dweller
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.recondi: §kA resource coveted by the Languid Dweller
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.a: Strengthen Obsidian Futher by Smelting it.
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.f: Sandesite that has been strengthened by melting the Zinc/Iron within it to create an amalgam.
Smelt it to get stone, or Combine with clay to get an Unfired Brick
Smelt it to get Netherrack, or Combine with clay to get an Unfired Nether Brick
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.g: Is there a way to get my gold back from this? No?
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.h: Gives salt a purpose as a decorative/building block
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.o: Turn Magma into a Fancy Lamp
A Stronger, Slip-Proof Version of Ice
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.s: This berry is a favorite treat among Cani, and is safe for human consumption
block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.canis_bed: Shift-click with your Canis nearby and they will come and make the bed their own. If your Canis Perishes, right-click their bed to revive them.
item.rigoranthusemortisreborn.master_cha: Change the Master of a Canis
item.rigoranthusemortisreborn.creative_c: Gives Unlimited Skill points to spend
treat.homini_treat.low_level: Your Canis is too low of a level for these treats.
treat.homini_treat.too_young: This Canis too young to learn skills.
treat.homini_treat.max_level: CONGRATULATIONS! Your Canis has reached the ultimate level!
treat.normal_treat.too_young: This Canis is too young learn skills just yet.
treat.normal_treat.max_level: Your Canis is too strong to gain anything from these measly treats.
treat.big_bone.too_young: This Canis is too young for this bone.
treat.tiny_bone.too_young: This Canis is too young for this bone.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.homebound: While a Canis with this skill is on your head, your bed will be highlighted in a black outline. To get the Canis on you head, right click on them with a bone in hand. The range at which it can do this is equal to 200 blocks per level, but becomes infinite at level 5.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.brawler.d: Improves critical hit rate 1/2 a heart for every level, plus an extra heart when you master it
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.sentinel_: Increases the chance that your Canis will completely block a physical attack
Every level grants a 10%% chance to make anything your Canis kills drop its loot twice, Level 5 grants an extra 10%%, bringing it up to a 60%% chance
Allows your Canis set things on fire while attacking. The higher the level, the longer the fire lasts. Mastering the skill grants your Canis immunity to fire
Allows you to ride your Canis. Every level increases the jump-strength of your Canis. To ride your Canis: With an empty hand, Jump & Right-Click the Canis while mid-air.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.wayward_t: Each level adds 3 inventory slots to the Wayward-Traveller GUI. To open the GUI: Sneak + Right-click your Canis. At level 5, your Canis will automatically pick up any nearby items. (If it has space in its inventory)
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.calloused: Every level allows your Canis fall 3 more blocks before it starts taking damage. Mastering the skill makes your Canis completely immune to fall damage, and also capable of floating when falling!
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.rapid_rec: Improves the rate at which your Canis heals without needing to rest. Mastering the skill will heal your Canis 50%% faster while sitting.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.powderkeg: A Canis with this skill can detect creepers in the area & will growl to warn you. The range at which your Canis, can detect creepers increases by 6 blocks per level, and mastering this skill will make your Canis capable of attacking creepers Your Canis will reset the creeper's detonation timer with each attack.
Increases your Canis's movement speed while chasing a target and while it is being ridden. Every level grants a 12%% increase, and mastering it grants an additional 15%% increase
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.oceanic_r: Whenever your Canis enters the water, it may catch a fish which it will give to you when it shakes itself dry The chance of catching a fish increases with level, and any points in HellHound may cause the fish to be pre-cooked. Mastering this skill lets your Canis breathe underwater.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.chungus_p: Increases the NP your Canis gets from food items by 10%% per level. Additionally, at level 3 your Canis will become a less picky eater allowing it to consume rotten flesh, and level 5 lets your Canis eat bones.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.undertake: Inflicts 1 point of damage on all nearby undead, at random. Increasing the skill level increases the range by 3 blocks and mastering the skill doubles the damage.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.perniciou: Your Canis's attacks will poison their target, and the poison's duration increases with level. At level 3 your Canis becomes immune to poison, and mastering this skill allows you to cleanse yourself of all potion effects, including poison, by right-clicking on your Canis with a spider eye, at the cost of 30 NP.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.herder.de: Put the Herder's whistle in your hand, and any trained Herder Cani in docile mode will rustle up some (amount based on level) nearby livestock making it easier to transport livestock long distances. This is tiring though, and costs nourishment points the cost is reduced with higher levels in the skill
Put the Summoner's whistle in your hand, and any Summoner Cani in docile mode will summon some Cadavers to aid you in your endeavors. Summoned Cadavers are friendly to you & will dissapear after a few minutes. The cost is reduced with higher levels in the skill
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.savior_ca: If you're at critical health and a Canis with this skill is following you, it will attempt to heal you half a heart per level in this skill, at the cost of 100 NP Mastering this skill reduces the cost to 80 NP
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.tempest.d: Use the tempest whistle to command your Canis to stun nearby enemies with a threatening growl! The duration of the stun effects and damage per use will increase and the cooldown time will decrease per level. Mastering this skill will set the cooldown time to 40 ticks (2 seconds), and the effect duration will be set to 70 ticks (3.5 seconds).
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.piercing_: This skill will cause your Canis to scare the fuck out of villagers, prompting them to surrender their goods. Higher levels in the skill increase the quality of the goods. This can only be done once every two Minecraft days. Mastering the skill allows you to do this once every Minecraft day.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.neptunes_: Allows you to ride your Canis in water and it to breath longer underwater. Maxing it allows the rider to see easily underwater.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.iridescen: Allows your Canis put torch when light level is down, at the cost of one torch from it's inventory. To give it torches you can drop some nearby and it will pick it up. At level 5 Cani don't need torches in their inventory anymore.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.tempest.l: Put skill points into Tempest to use.
%s: Woooff, woof, woof woofff (Feed me you fucking scumbag)
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.piercing_: Jesus christ waht the fuck is that thing?!
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.wayward_t: The canis inventory is no longer accessed this way. Open your inventory and click on the canis inventories button
canis.mode.wandering.description: In this mode your Canis will remain near it's bowl and await your next command. To set you Canis's bowl, bring your Canis within a few blocks of it.
canis.mode.tactical.description: In this mode your Canis will follow you, but will not attack anything unless commanded to
canis.mode.aggressive.description: In this mode your Canis will follow you, and attack anything that attacks you or that you attack
canis.mode.berserker.description: In this mode your Canis will follow you, and actively hunt nearby monsters.
canis.mode.docile.description: In this mode your Canis will follow you but not attack anything.
canis.mode.patrol.description: Use a command emblem to set 2-4 points in which your Canis will patrol, attacking any monsters that try to pass.
canis.mode.guard.description: Your Canis will follow closely and attack any monsters that come too close.
canis.mode.incapacitated.help: %s is incapacitated and requires a Bottle of Ichor to revive %s.
canis.gender.female.subject: she
canis.gender.female.title: girl
canis.gender.male.subject: he
canis.gender.male.title: boy
canis.gender.unisex.subject: they
canis.gender.unisex.title: unisex
canisradar.errornoradio: **** Remember to put radio collar on your canis ****
canisradar.errorown: **** You are not %s's Master. Gain permission to interact with %d! ****
argument.rigoranthusemortisreborn.uuid.f: %s is of the wrong format. Should contain 4 dashes
argument.rigoranthusemortisreborn.uuid.s: %s contains one or more invalid characters
commands.canisrevive.uuid.failure: Failed to raise %s from the dead
command.canisrevive.imprecise: Too many Cani (%d) for this master under this name, use `byuuid` for %s
canisbed.explain.missing: This item has likely needs to be spawned in directly!
